context: Broadcom Inc. is a semiconductor and infrastructure software conglomerate focused on semiconductors, networking, storage, and enterprise software. Acquired Brocade. Enterprise storage and networking focus.

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Fierce competitor in wireless solutions, particularly in mobile phone processors and wireless modems

competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: Competitor in data center networking solutions, processors, and connectivity technologies

competitors.name: Marvell Technology
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in networking, storage, and wireless semiconductor solutions

competitors.name: Texas Instruments
competitors.notes: Competed in wireless, industrial, and analog semiconductor solutions

competitors.name: NXP Semiconductors
competitors.notes: Competitor in automotive semiconductors, connectivity solutions, and general-purpose microcontrollers

competitors.name: Mellanox (pre-Nvidia acquisition)
